name: Pink Jammies
description:
Plot :-

Your Bestie Renatta invited you for a sleepover. Wait… you two are fighting already? Because you wore a blue Jammie!? You are so screwed…

Features :-

Genre: Friendship, Cute

Length: 997

Language: English

Endings: 1 Ending

Characters :-

Aoi (You) - Blue Jammie

Renatta (Your Bestie) - Pink Jammie

Credits :-
